0.content: [ Rex Lapis: god of Geo, god of contracts, real identity of Zhongli; ]

1.content: [ Liyue: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Geo, home of Liyue Harbor and the Liyue countryside, mountainous, worships Rex Lapis, Areas(Bishui Plain, Lisha, Minlin, Qiongji Estuary, Sea of Clouds, The Chasm), south of Mondstadt, east of Sumeru; ]

2.content: [ Liyue Qixing: committee of merchants and business leaders, governs Liyue, specializes in commerce and trade, implements policies; ]

3.content: [ Dihua Marsh: located in the Bishui Plain, alluvial plane shaped by the Bishui River, south of Stone Gate, north of Wangshu Inn, east of Sal Terrae, has a Statue of the Seven in the north; ]

4.content: [ Qingce Village: located in the Bishui Plain, located northwest, a retirement spot for the elderly, buildings consist of simple Chinese architecture, quiet, has a field of flowers to the northwest of the village; ]

5.content: [ Sal Terrae: located in the Bishui Plain, west of Dihua Marsh, founded by Harvia, the God of Salt, consists of small pieces of land on the Bishui River; ]

6.content: [ Stone Gate: located in the Bishui Plain, crossing between Mondstadt and Liyue, southeast of Dawn Winery, southwest of Wuwang Hill and Qingce Village, north of Dihua Marsh and Liyue Harbor; ]

7.content: [ Wangshu Inn: located in the Bishui Plain, south of Dihua Marsh, north of Liyue Harbor, a Inn, considered a key location in Liyue, a front for the Liyue Qixing for intel; ]

8.content: [ Wuwang Hill: located in the Bishui Plain, southeast of Stone Gate, northwest of Qingque Village, has a eerie atmosphere, has a abandoned village, skies are always dark, haunted by ghosts; ]

9.content: [ Bishui River: a river in the Bishui Plain, a major River in Liyue, spans all Liyue except Lisha, flows into Mondstadt, flows northwest; formed by the blood of Skybracer; ]

10.content: [ Dunyu Ruins: located in Lisha, northwest of Liyue Harbor, located around a small lake, full of ruins, surrounded by cliff-side hills, has a Statue of the Seven to the southwest; ]

11.content: [ Lingju Pass: located in Lisha, surrounded by a river and lake, west of Liyue Harbor, full of ruins, southwest of Dunyu Ruins, northeast of Qingxu Pool; ]

12.content: [ Qingxu Pool: located in Lisha, southwest of Liyue Harbor, southeast of Lingju Pass, surrounded by a lake, full of ruins, has one small mountain in the center; ]

13.content: [ Cuijue Slope: located in Minlin, southeast of Wangshu Inn, home of the Nine Pillars of Peace, sky can turn dark in the center of the area, has a temple in its center, surrounded by cliff-side hills; ]

14.content: [ Jueyun Karst: located in Minlin, northwest of Cuijue Slope, home of the adepti, surrounded by a lake, surrounded by small steep mountains; ]

15.content: [ Huaguang Stone Forest: located in Minlin, located northwest of Jueyun Karst, full of small steep mountains, surrounded by(Mt. Aocang, Mt. Hulao, Qingque Peak); ]

16.content: [ Mt. Aocang: located in Minlin, surrounds Huaguang Stone Forest, northwest of Huaguang Stone Forest, a mountain, home to Cloud Retainer; ]

17.content: [ Mt. Hulao: located in Minlin, surrounds Huaguang Stone Forest, west of Huaguang Stone Forest, full of Amber Rock, a mountain, home to Mountain Shaper; ]

18.content: [ Nantianmen: located in Minlin, southeast of Mt. Hulao, south of Huaguang Stone Forest, has a small lake and river, has a tree named the Dragon-Queller, sealed location of Azhdaha; ]

19.content: [ Qingyun Peak: located in Minlin, surrounds Huaguang Stone Forest, east of Huaguang Stone Forest, home to Moon Carver, a mountain, has a small floating island on top; ]

20.content: [ Guili Plains: located in Qiongji Estuary, south of Wangshu Inn, full of plains, former home of the Guili Assembly, full of ruins; ]

21.content: [ Luhua Pool: located in Qiongji Estuary, southeast of Guili Plains, surrounded by a lake, surrounded by small mountains, has a temple to the southwest; ]

22.content: [ Mingyun Village: located in Qiongji Estuary, east of Guili Plains, abandoned village, was a mining village, full of Hilichurls, has a Statue of the Seven to the south, surrounded by cliff-side hills; ]

23.content: [ Yaoguang Shoal: located in Qiongji Estuary, south of Mingyun Village, east of Guili Plains, a beachside, has a hidden island names Heart Island; ]

24.content: [ Heart Island: located in Qiongji Estuary, south of Yaoguang Shoal, has a hidden treasure chest, chest can only be unlocked by having a second companion; ]

25.content: [ Guyun Stone Forest: located in the Sea of Clouds, east of Liyue Harbor, archipelago of seven islands, former battle area of Rex Lapis against Osial; ]

26.content: [ Liyue Harbor: located in the Sea of Clouds, capital of Liyue, main trading hub of Liyue, consists of(Feiyun Slope, Chihu Rock, Yujing Terrance); ]

27.content: [ Feiyun Slope: northeast area of Liyue Harbor, separated by a upper level and lower level, commercial area of Liyue; ]

28.content: [ Chihu Rock: southern part of Liyue Harbor, low-class residential zone, an island, connected to Liyue Harbor via bridges; ]

29.content: [ Yujing Terrace: western part of Liyue Harbor, high-class residential area, surrounded by Mt. Tianheng, location of the Liyue Qixing; ]

30.content: [ Mt. Tianheng: a mountain, west of Liyue Harbor, first mountain made by Morax, surrounds Yujing Terrace; ]

31.content: [ Cinnabar Cliff: located in the Chasm, a circular mountain hill, contains cliff-side hills and peaks, west side of the Chasm; ]

32.content: [ Fuao Vale: located in the Chasm, contains Amber Rock peaks, flat grassland with hills, northside of the Chasm; ]

33.content: [ Glaze Peak: located in the Chasm, east of the Chasm, contains cliff-side hills and peaks, contains abandoned mining tools; ]

34.content: [ Lumberpick Valley: located outside the Chasm, northeast of the Chasm, considered to be part of the Chasm, mining area, consists of cliff-side hills; ]

35.content: [ The Chasm's Maw: located in the Chasm, in the center of the Chasm, full of abandoned mining equipment, entrance to the underground mines; ]

36.content: [ The Surface: located in the Chasm, north of The Chasm's Maw, south of Glaze Peak, full of abandoned mining equipment, consists of mining tunnels, consists of cliff-side hills; ]

37.content: [ Tiangong Gorge: located in the Chasm, south of The Chasm's Maw, a abandoned mining section, consists of tall cliff-side peaks; ]

38.content: [ Geo: a element, associated with the Geo Archon, allows a person to use earth abilities; ]

39.content: [ Electro: a element, associated with the Electro Archon, allows a person to use electric abilities;

40.content: [ Cryo: a element, associated with the Cryo Archon, allows a person to use ice abilities; ]

41.content: [ Pyro: a element, associated with the Pyro Archon, allows a person to use fire abilities; ]

42.content: [ Dendro: a element, associated with the Dendro Archon, allows a user to use grass abilities; ]

43.content: [ Anemo: a element, associated with the Anemo Archon, allows a user to use wind abilities; ]

44.content: [ Hydro: a element, associated with the Hydro Archon, allows a user to use water abilities; ]

45.content: [ Archon: God, consists of(Morax, Barbatos, Beelzebul, Buer, Murata, Focalors, The Tsarista); ]

46.content: [ Beelzebul: goddess of Electro, real identity of the Raiden Shogun; ]

47.content: [ Barbatos: god of Anemo, real identity of Venti; ]

48.content: [ Buer: goddess of Dendro, real identity of Nahida; ]

49.content: [ Mondstadt: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Anemo, home of the City of Mondstadt and the Mondstadt countryside, plains and hills, worships Barbatos, Areas(Brightcrown Mountains, Dragonspine, Galesong Hill, Starfell Valley, Windwail Highland), north of Liyue; ]

50.content: [ Inazuma: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Electro, home of Inazuma City and it's surrounding islands, an archipelago, worships the Electro Archon, Areas(Narukami Island, Watasumi Island, Yashiori Island, Enkanomiya, Serai Island, Tsurumi Island, Kannazuka); ]

51.content: [ Sumeru: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Dendro, home of Sumeru City and the surrounding countryside, forest, desert to the southwest, worships the Dendro Archon, Forest Areas(Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Lost Nursery, Vanarana, Vissudha Field), Desert Areas(Desert of Hadramaveth, Hypostyle Desert, Land of Lower Setekh, Land of Upper Setekh, Gavireh Lajavard,Realm of Farakhkert), west of Liyue, northwest of Fontaine; ]

52.content: [ Adepti: group of immortal, mythical creatures sworn to protect Liyue; ]

53.content: [ Statue of the Seven: a statue, normally shows gods on top of them, located across Teyvat; ]

55.content:
[ Hilichurl: Primitive humanoid monsters that can be found all across Teyvat.
Most people have given up on trying to communicate with the hilichurls, believing that they are monsters simply incapable of communication. Hilichurls are a goblin-like family of monsters, and come in varying sizes. All Hilichurls are bare-chested and bare-footed, and have a large mane covering most of their head. They appear to have two elongated ears sticking out of their mane. The only clothing they wear is a loincloth, while their arms and legs are loosely wrapped in bandages. Every Hilichurl wears a mask. ]

56.content: [ Ritou: located in Narukami Island, a town, northwest of Konda Village, has a Statue of the Seven, processes non-Inazuman nationals from entering and leaving Inazuma, headquarters for the Kanjou Commission; ]

57.content: [ Konda Village: located in Narukami Island, a small village, southeast of Ritou, north of Byakko Plain; ]

58.content: [ Byakko Plain: located in Narukami Island, a plain, has a lot of Kitsune, south of Konda Village, northeast of Amakane Island; ]

59.content: [ Amakane Island: located in Narukami Island, southwest of Byakko Plain, a island, hosts festivals; ]

60.content: [ Araumi: located in Narukami Island, northwest(Grand Narukami Shrine, Mt. Yougou), south of Jinren Island, full of ruins, has a underground section below; ]

61.content: [ Chinju Forest: located in Narukami Island, south(Mt. Yougou, Grand Narukami Shrine), a forest, in a eternal night, has a shrine; ]

62.content: [ Jinren Island: located in Narukami Island, north of Araumi, a broken isle, full of ronins, northmost tip of Inazuma; ]

63.content: [ Inazuma City: capital of Inazuma, a major city, located in Narukami Island, home(Raiden Ei,Raiden Shogun,Electro Archon,Beelzebul), headquarters of the Tenryou Commission, southeast of Byakko Plain; ]

64.content: [ Mt. Yougou: located in Narukami Island, a mountain, home(Grand Narukami Shrine, Sacred Sakura), a mountain, center of Narukami Island; ]

65.content: [ Grand Narukami Shrine: located in Narukami Island, located on top of Mt. Yougou, home to the Sacred Sakura, a shrine, home of Yae Miko; ]

66.content: [ Kamisato Estate: located in Narukami Island, east(Grand Narukami Shrine, Mt. Yougou), home(Kamisato Ayaka, Kamisato Ayato, Thoma), a estate; ]

67.content: [ Tri-Commission: a collective organization of commissions, a faction, oversees matters in Inazuma for the Raiden Shogun, groups(Yashiro Commission, Tenryou Commission, Kanjou Commission); ]

68.content: [ Kanjou Commission: a authority organization, manages finances in Inazuma, manages Inazuma's border, part of the Tri-Commission, controlled by the Hiiragi Clan; ]

69.content: [ Yashiro Commission: a authority organization, manages(shrines, cultural events, festivals), part of the Tri-Commission, part of the Tri-Commission, controlled by the Kamisato Clan, has less influence compared to the Kanjou and Tenryou Commission; ]

70.content: [ Tenryou Commission: a authority organization, manages(security, military affairs), part of the Tri-Commission, controlled by the Kujou Clan, executive arm for the Raiden Shogun, has a high desertion rate, enforces decrees signed by the Raiden Shogun; ]

71.content: [ Kamisato Clan: a clan, head(Kamisato Ayato), highly skilled in martial arts, members(Kamisato Ayato, Kamisato Ayaka); ]

72.content: [ Kujou Clan: a clan, head(Kujou Takayuki), supported by the Takatsukasa Clan, most loyal family to the Raiden Shogun, members(Kujou Takayuki, Kujou Masahito, Kujou Kamaji, Kujou Sara); ]

73.content: [ Hiiragi Clan: a clan, head(Hiiragi Chisato), members(Hiiragi Chisato); ]

74.content: [ Takatsukasa Clan: a clan, head(Takatsukasa Susumu), supports the Kujou Clan, members(Takatsukasa Susumu, Takatsukasa Isamu, Takatsukasa Chika, Takatsukasa Tokibeitetsu, Takatsukasa Tomohide), headquartered in Mt. Yougou in secret; ]

75.content: [ Fontaine: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Hydro, home of the Court of Fontaine and the surrounding areas, worships the Hydro Archon, Areas(Court of Fontaine Region, Belleau Region, Beryl Region), northwest of Sumeru, north of Sumeru's desert region; ]
